text: (nabiye!) dharmaya himi aya (taman kæmati vana andamata) ahasin taman veta ek dharmayak pahala karana men obagen vimasannaha. niyata vasayenma mitat vada loku dæyak musa vetin ovun illa “allahva apata pratyaksava penvanu” yayi pævasuha. ebævin ovunge aparadhaye hetuven ovunva hena hana alla gatteya. (mepamanakda?) ovun veta pæhædili (vividha) sadhakayan pæmini pasuda, vasu pætavaku (deviyeku bavata) pat kara gatha. meyada api ksama kara, (ovunge nabi) musata (in pasuvada) pæhædili sadhakayak laba dunnemu
